  "risk_factors": [
    ["age", "medium", "Being 18 puts her at higher risk age bracket, but female gender moderates this"],
    ["prior arrests", "low", "Only 1 prior arrest indicates limited criminal history"],
    ["education", "low", "High school completion and college enrollment are strong protective factors"],
    ["employment", "low", "Having maintained employment shows stability"],
    ["drug use", "low", "Only marijuana use, no hard drugs reported"],

    ["living situation", "medium", "Living alone at young age could reduce social support/monitoring"],

risk_factors: Being 18 puts her at higher risk age bracket, but female gender moderates this
Only 1 prior arrest indicates limited criminal history
High school completion and college enrollment are strong protective factors
Only marijuana use, no hard drugs reported
Stable two-parent household during childhood is protective
Living alone at young age could reduce social support/monitoring
No reported depression is positive indicator
Religious/spiritual connection can be a protective factor
Urban setting may present more risk opportunities

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old female who identifies herself as Black. She has been arrested 1 time and has been convicted. She is 5 feet 10 inches and weighs 127 lbs. She has never been married and is currently living alone. She has a high school diploma and is enrolled in a 4-year college. She has held 1 job during the year. She has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, she lived with both of her biological parents in a household of size 4, in an urban area. She considers that God has something to do with what happens to her personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
